fields_of_interest: Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Legislative issues related to energy, climate, environment, traffic and transport policy and energy taxation.
organisation_name: Öljy- ja biopolttoaineala ry - Finnish Petroleum and Biofuels Association
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
European Heating Oil Association Eurofuel (https://eurofuel.eu/), 
Co-operation as a National Oil Industry Association (NOIA) with FuelsEurope (https://www.fuelseurope.eu/).
goals__remit: The objective of the association is to promote the conduct of responsible and profitable business in the Finnish oil and liquid biofuels sector, to implement projects promoting positive development in the sector, to protect and further the general and common interests of its members, and to act as a common forum for its members in the oil and biofuels sector, while acknowledging the principles of free competition between its members and not interfering in its members' internal matters.
relevant_communication: Implementation of the voluntary energy efficiency agreement between the oil sector and the Fnnish Government regarding energy efficiency programme for heating fuels.
